name: Entrance
description: Welcome to the speedway! This is the main entrance where all the excitement begins. Here, you'll start your adventure into the world of high-speed racing and unforgettable events.

name: Ticket Office
description: Visit our ticket office to purchase or pick up your tickets. Our friendly staff can help answer any questions you may have about the event schedules.

name: Irwindale Dragstrip
description: Experience the thrill at Los Angeles's premier drag strip. The Irwindale Dragstrip is renowned for its adrenaline-pumping races, showcasing some of the fastest vehicles and skilled drivers in the region.

name: Irwindale Speedway
description: Irwindale Speedway offers exhilarating races and spectacular views from every seat. Feel the speed and roar of engines in what's truly a racer's paradise.

name: Concessions
description: Satisfy your cravings at our concession stands, which offer a variety of food and beverages. From classic snacks to hearty meals, there's something here to fuel your excitement through every lap.

name: Pit Area
description: Get up close to the heart of racing in our Pit Area. Accessible with a pit pass, this area offers a behind-the-scenes look at team preparations and car setupsâ€”perfect for motor enthusiasts eager to learn more about the racing world.

name: Parking Lot
description: Conveniently located close to all the action, our parking lot provides ample space for your vehicle. Arrive early to secure a spot and enjoy a short walk to the main attractions.

name: Burnout Box
description: Feel the heat at the Burnout Box, where drivers prep their tires for the ultimate traction before hitting the strip. It's a must-see for those who love the spectacle of smoke and revving engines.
